metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5197 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A use-after-free vulnerability in the Linux kernel's netfilter: nf_tablescomponent can be exploited to achieve local privilege escalation. Additionand removal of rules from chain bindings within the same transaction causesleads to use-after-free. We recommend upgrading past commitf15f29fd4779be8a418b66e9d52979bb6d6c2325.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
